title: Laugh slap howl
creator_credit: Cath Murphy and Victorian College of the Arts
brief_description: An animated film about an old lady and her dog living together in a block of flats who are disturbed by some unearthly noises coming from the hallway. Both scared, they proceed down the hall to a darkly lit room, the source of the strange noises.
creator_credit_for_label: Cath Murphy and Victorian College of the Arts
